question.title: Spring throws UnknownContentTypeException for empty json object property
question.body:
I'm working with 2 component with Spring MVC that shares a REST API protocol.

The server gives this answer:

{
    "id":1,
    "alerts": {}
}

Both shares the same class to map this answer:

public class MyReturn{
    private int id = 0;
    private Map<String,String> alerts;
}

The client after response parse throws this error:

org.springframework.web.client.UnknownContentTypeException: Could not extract response: no suitable HttpMessageConverter found for response type [MyReturn] and content type [application/json]

It seems related to the empty map/object. Why it is complaining about it? How can I let accept this empty map?
